RestrictionTarget.summary: NOTE Experimental The RestrictionTarget interface of the {{domxref("Screen Capture API", "Screen Capture API", "", "nocode")}} provides a static method, , which returns a RestrictionTarget instance that can be used to restrict a captured video track to a specified DOM element.

remarks.para:
-Screen Capture API
-Using the Element Capture and Region Capture APIs

RestrictionTargetFromElement.summary: NOTE Experimental The fromElement() static method of the interface returns a instance that can be used to restrict a captured video track to a specified DOM element (plus its descendants).

remarks.para:
-Screen Capture API
-Using the Element Capture and Region Capture APIs

RestrictionTargetFromElement.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a object instance, which can then be passed to to restrict the video captured in the track to just the particular DOM element the RestrictionTarget was created with.RestrictionTarget objects are serializable. They can be passed to another document using mechanisms such as .The promise will reject if the restriction target element is not eligible for restriction.
